task.title: Creating an animated GIF from images using gifmaker.me
task.shortdesc: Using gifmaker.me is an easy and free way of converting images into animated GIF format. You can also reformat your images by cropping, resizing, and optimizing. Gifmaker.me provides a multitude of ways to personalize your GIF.

prereq.p: You will need images you want to convert to GIF format.

step.cmd: Make any according changes in the control panel.
step.info: Image of gifmaker.me control panel You can change animation speed, canvas size, and how many times the GIF can repeat itself.

step.stepresult: After conversion is complete, you will be able to view the GIF, download it, or continue to format your newly created GIF.
